attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE! 🤢 DONT DOWNLOAD🙅🏽‍♀️🚫
attributes.review: I HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THIS APP. To start off, it’s took YEARS TO LOAD. I was practically in my DEATH BED by the time it was finally done!! So as soon as I got on it crashed and a black screen showed up and said “DO NOT USE THIS APP! I REPEAT DONT USE THIS APP” with a button that said “continue” and another that said “ESCAPE WHILE YOU STILL CAN”. So I pressed continue and it said “so you have chosen death” with a picture of Donald Trump pointing at me, with devil ears. THAN MY PHONE CAUGHT ON FIRE!! So without thinking, I THREW my phone on the floor and my house CAUGHT ON FIRE! So I grabbed my mom and siblings and ran out in a rush. Out of nowhere a random man came running out of my house screaming, “DONT DOWNLOAD THE DONALD TRUMP APP”!! Soon after the Fire fighters came and with a huge hose and ran into my room, to hose down my phone. Soon the fire fighters came out holding my phone and put another fire on it, to disinfect my poor phone. Once the fire was out, a man came with his ice cream truck and gave me an ice cream saying “Trump2020” When I finished it, I passed out. When I woke up, i was in a hospital. The doctors told me that there was poison in the ice cream, because that the words “Trump2020” is literally poison to the public, and handed me a new ice cream saying “𝓼𝓮𝓽𝓽𝓵𝓮 𝓯𝓸𝓻 𝓫𝓲𝓭𝓮𝓷2020" which gave me superhuman powers! Long story short, don’t use this app or vote Trump because you’ll have to pay a debt of 🤍🧚🏻‍♂️✨a million dollars✨🧚🏻‍♂️🤍

attributes.title: TRUMPS STUPID
attributes.review: TRUMP IS STUPID, RACIST, HOMOPHOBIC, AND HE HAS ZERO COMMON SENSE! HE CANT ACCEPT AMERICANS FOR WHO THEY HAVE THE RIGHT TO BE. HES ALSO ASSAULTED MANY YOUNG GIRLS AND WOMEN AND PAYED THEM NOT TO SAY ANYTHING! HE TREATS OTHER PEOPLE LIKE THEY ARE HIS LITTLE TOYS AND ITS NOT OK. HE DOES NOT NEED TO BE PRESIDENT! THIS APP ALSO TOOK A WEEK TO DOWNLOAD! AND MY PHONE WAS SO GLITCHY AFTER IT DOWNLOADED ON TO MY PHONE HE IS CRAZY AND NEEDS TO BE LOCKED UP!!!
